isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - Without Headset Jack

svcproc.title: Without Headset Jack
svcproc.para: Audio power is fed to the left bunk speaker volume control on circuits 86AR/86AB and 86AS/86AC. Audio power is fed to the right bunk speaker volume control on circuits 86AU/86AP and 86AT/86AE. Audio power is then fed to the left bunk speaker on circuits 86AW and 86AX. Audio power is fed to the right bunk speaker on circuits 86AY and 86AZ.
